summary: The document is an agent report concerning a potential counter-intelligence interest at the C Team, 66th USA Artillery Detachment, located in Datteln, Federal Republic of Germany. It outlines unsuccessful efforts to interview John C. Stelpflug and John P. Lukasik in connection with the incident. Stelpflug had been discharged from the US Army and returned to the United States, whereas Lukasik was transferred to the USA Air Defense School at Fort Bliss, Texas. Initially classified, the document was later regraded to unclassified on September 2, 1994.
key_findings: Failed attempts to interview individuals linked to a suspected counter-intelligence incident.
Information on the post-incident whereabouts and military status of John C. Stelpflug and John P. Lukasik.
Evolution of the document's classification from restricted to unclassified.
